meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.1 ::date 2012-12-19T08:34:05 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt This early morning the soccer match between the Chinese women 's team and the Korean team had indeed made me excited , I was surprised by the match 's brilliance , and I also gained a new understanding of the Korean team . # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_1.txt
sentence: This early morning the soccer match between the Chinese women 's team and the Korean team had indeed made me excited , I was surprised by the match 's brilliance , and I also gained a new understanding of the Korean team .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.2 ::date 2012-12-19T08:36:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt They attacked swiftly and fearlessly and coordinated with tacit understanding , but looking back at the Chinese women 's soccer team , it was in an inferior position either in time - control or coordination . # ::save-date Thu Jan 11, 2018 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_2.txt
sentence: They attacked swiftly and fearlessly and coordinated with tacit understanding , but looking back at the Chinese women 's soccer team , it was in an inferior position either in time - control or coordination .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.3 ::date 2012-12-14T11:42:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt We lost this game with no complaints . # ::save-date Sun Apr 6, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_3.txt
sentence: We lost this game with no complaints .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.4 ::date 2012-12-14T11:43:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But looking at the match between the Chinese men 's soccer team and the Iranians , that goal -- the insulting , provocative , and perverse goal -- made me question the quality of the Iranian team and even of the people in that country . # ::save-date Sun Jun 21, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_4.txt
sentence: But looking at the match between the Chinese men 's soccer team and the Iranians , that goal -- the insulting , provocative , and perverse goal -- made me question the quality of the Iranian team and even of the people in that country .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.5 ::date 2012-12-16T15:26:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The Chinese team showed their guts during this game ; they manifested the courage and fighting spirit of Chinese people . # ::save-date Sun Apr 6, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_5.txt
sentence: The Chinese team showed their guts during this game ; they manifested the courage and fighting spirit of Chinese people .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.6 ::date 2012-12-19T06:53:28 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt We did not shy away from the powerful Iranian team , but did our best ; it was n't until after an overtime and two rounds of penalty kicks that we then regretfully lost the match . # ::save-date Thu Oct 26, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_6.txt
sentence: We did not shy away from the powerful Iranian team , but did our best ; it was n't until after an overtime and two rounds of penalty kicks that we then regretfully lost the match .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.7 ::date 2012-12-22T19:33:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Let us remember the Iranian team , remember this Iranian player who scored this goal -- Borhani . # ::save-date Sun Apr 6, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_7.txt
sentence: Let us remember the Iranian team , remember this Iranian player who scored this goal -- Borhani .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.8 ::date 2012-12-22T19:32:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The IOC warriors return to our motherland with hope . # ::save-date Wed Jul 1, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_8.txt
sentence: The IOC warriors return to our motherland with hope .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0069.9 ::date 2012-12-10T11:12:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I believe there will eventually be a day when we will -- avenge # ::save-date Tue Jan 2, 2018 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0069_9.txt
sentence: I believe there will eventually be a day when we will -- avenge
